synopsis.text: Kishrika, the Great Emperor of the Demon World, bestows a mysterious power upon Rudeus Greyrat after he saves her, leading to unexpected challenges and dangers in their quest to return home. Alongside his fierce student Eris Boreas Greyrat and the former Superd warrior Ruijerd Supardia, Rudeus forms the successful adventurer party 'Dead End.' As they journey across the Demon Continent, they encounter a shady character named Gallus, only to realize they may have helped the wrong group. Meanwhile, Roxy embarks on a mission to find Rudeus. The trio must navigate the treacherous Demon Continent, learning that their decisions carry real consequences, as they strive to return to their homeland in the world of "Mushoku Tensei: Jobless Reincarnation (Part 2)."
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
